info.name: Simple Greyscale Tumblr Theme
info.description:
This is just a compilation of small changes.
-Fanmail posts are compact
-Font is justified Calibri
-Buttons, background, and post icons are in dark greyscale
-Personal Tumblr logo option
*Works with X-kit Tweaks extension*
info.additionalInfo:
Custom Tumblr logo dimensions: 187 x 40

[01.06.15] Fixed avatar display on posts throughout & fixed peepr glass appearance
[02.20.15] Fixed indash blog, blog settings, & permalink appearance
[04.15.15] Fixed to fit changes to dashboard layout
[05.06.15] Fixed recommended posts appearance
